content: Good afternoon! Recently been interested in getting the CQF-Ruler set up internally and successfully got it stood up today. However, we're running into the issue of where the HAPI FHIR UI does not render correctly because its trying to pull the css, js, etc from the root of our url instead of the root/cqf-ruler/ url. Is there a setting somewhere that I need to change so the UI renders correctly?
Update: We figured it out and got it working
